name: Invalid id formats should return appropriate error codes
scenarioId: petstore/get_order:Invalid id formats should return appropriate error codes
methodName: Invalid id formats should return appropriate error codes

testSteps.description: 1: Invalid id formats should return appropriate error codes ({id=abc, expectedStatus=404, type=unknown, message=java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: \"abc\"})

children.description: Given the order does not exist with id "abc"
When the client requests order with id "abc"
client executes a GET on the resource /store/order/{id}
GET https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/store/order/abc

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Date: Thu, 08 Jan 2026 21:35:41 GMT
Content-Type: application/json
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Connection: keep-alive
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, DELETE, PUT
Access-Control-Allow-Headers: Content-Type, api_key, Authorization
Server: Jetty(9.2.9.v20150224)

children.description: Then the response status should be 404
And the response should include error type "unknown"
And the response should include error message "java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: \"abc\""

testSteps.description: 2: Invalid id formats should return appropriate error codes ({id=1.23, expectedStatus=404, type=unknown, message=java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: \"1.23\"})

children.description: Given the order does not exist with id "1.23"
When the client requests order with id "1.23"
client executes a GET on the resource /store/order/{id}

children.description: Then the response status should be 404
And the response should include error type "unknown"
And the response should include error message "java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: \"1.23\""

testSteps.description: 3: Invalid id formats should return appropriate error codes ({id=-5, expectedStatus=404, type=error, message=Order not found})

children.description: Given the order does not exist with id "-5"
When the client requests order with id "-5"
client executes a GET on the resource /store/order/{id}
GET https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/store/order/-5

children.description: Then the response status should be 404

And the response should include error message "Order not found"
